@usedefault
@@title Image: ${name}
{{image_data}}
{% if id %}
h3. Image: ${name}

{{actions:
- display: Image Availability
  action: '#image_update_cpu_nodes'

- display: Rename
  input:
  - name: name
    label: Name
    type: text
  - type: text
    name: reason
    label: Reason
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/image/rename
  data:
   imageId: $$id

- display: Enable
  input:
  - reason
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/image/enable
  hideon:
  - CREATED
  hideonInput: ${status}
  data:
   imageId: $$id

- display: Disable
  input:
  - reason
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/image/disable
  hideon:
  - DISABLED
  hideonInput: ${status}
  data:
   imageId: $$id

- display: Delete
  input:
  - reason
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/image/delete
  data:
   imageId: $$id

}}

{{image_update_cpu_nodes: imageId:$$id}}

* *Description*:${description}
* *Type*:       ${type}
* *Size*:       ${size}
* *Status*:     ${status or "CREATED"}
* *ReferenceId*:${referenceId}

h4. Stacks which have this Image

{{stacks imageid:$$id}}

h4. Virtual Machines which use this image
{{vmachines imageid:$$id}}

{% else %}
No Image provided
{% endif %}
